description:
R rating is for one silo xing and stemming 20-30 feet above the deck for a couple hundred feet. The rappel lands in a pothole that may contain water. If you want brief, but real, R slot canyon experience then this may be for you. King Tut lands you in Egypt 3 below the upper tight section. To get the best of both worlds, descend King Tut and exit up Egypt 3.

Approach

Descent

Exit

Red tape

Beta sites

Trip reports and media

Background
name: King Tut
